home.description: Your digital refuge to relax, discover music and disconnect.

playlists.title: How do you feel today?
playlists.description: Tell us your mood so we can recommend playlists.

descriptions.1: Cheerful, energetic tracks to lift your mood.
descriptions.2: Indie and pop hits to keep the good vibes.
descriptions.3: Optimistic melodies to make you smile all day.
descriptions.4: Emotive songs to accompany your moments.
descriptions.5: Soft rhythms and calm melodies to help you unwind.
descriptions.6: Ambient music and nature sounds to disconnect.

1.title: Blue-Light Blocking Glasses
1.description: Glasses that block screen blue light to reduce eye strain and improve rest.

2.title: Vinylchill: Jazzy / Various
2.description: Smooth jazz vinyl, perfect to set relaxing spaces with an elegant nostalgic touch.

3.title: Ashwagandha Gummies
3.description: For stress and relaxation. With GABA, Rhodiola and Vitamins B6 & B12.

5.title: Finoly Mandala Coloring Book
5.description: Helps you stay away from screens and provides inner peace.

6.title: Wireless Headphones with ANC
6.description: Bluetooth headphones with active noise cancellation for immersive, distraction-free listening.

7.title: Essential-Oil Humidifier & Salt Lamp
7.description: Salt lamp with essential-oil diffuser that creates a warm, relaxing ambience—perfect for resting.

8.title: Magicteam White-Noise Machine
8.description: Portable white-noise machine with multiple sounds to help sleep and relax.

9.title: Electric Massage Mattress
9.description: Electric massage mat with heat and multiple modes to relieve muscle tension.

10.title: Heated Eye Massager
10.description: Eye massager with heat, vibration and Bluetooth music to relieve eye fatigue and relax body and mind.

11.title: Foot Massager with Remote
11.description: Electric foot massager with heat, air compression and shiatsu rollers for a spa-like experience at home or office.

12.title: Essential Oils for Diffuser
12.description: Set of 100 % natural floral essential oils—ideal for diffusers and creating a relaxing, aromatic atmosphere.
